PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-07412011-06-23,  ,  ,  EC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act
SubjectEstablishing Timelines for Comprehensive Studies Regulations
PrecisESTABLISHING TIMELINES FOR COMPREHENSIVE STUDIES REGULATIONS in order to streamline the administrative process and provide new authority for the Canadian Environmental Assessment Agency to assume responsibility for the conduct of all comprehensive studies except for projects regulated by the National Energy Board or the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0139 Publication Date: 2011-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Establishing Timelines for Comprehensive Studies Regulations
precis: ESTABLISHING TIMELINES FOR COMPREHENSIVE STUDIES REGULATIONS in order to streamline the administrative process and provide new authority for the Canadian Environmental Assessment Agency to assume responsibility for the conduct of all comprehensive studies except for projects regulated by the National Energy Board or the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission.
